Astral Cycle.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Increase the duration of Astral Mark by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Binary Star.card_desc: [Weapon] Star Splitter now deals 360 damage every 0.4s.

Cosmic Barrier.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Gain {scale=5|5}% damage reduction while using Stellar Wind.

Eclipse.card_desc: [Void Grip] Heal for {scale=50|50} Health per second while using Void Grip.

Falling Star.card_desc: [Void Grip] If a victim of Void Grip dies within 4s of being hit by the ability, reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=20|20}%

Heavenly Pull.card_desc: [Void Grip] Increase the Range you can use Void Grip by {scale=10|10}%

Inner Peace.card_desc: [Void Grip] Reduce the cooldown of Void Grip by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Lightyears.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Increase Astral Mark's range by {scale=10|10}%

Luminary.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Any ally affected by your Astral Mark deals 15% more weapon damage.

Relativity.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Applying Astral Mark heals you for {scale=40|40} Health per second over 10 seconds.

Retrograde.card_desc: [Astral Mark] Reduce the Cooldown of Astral Mark by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Solar Sails.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Gain {scale=2|2} ammo per second during Stellar Wind.

Space Jam.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Increase your jump height by {scale=12|12}% while using Stellar Wind.

Star Seeker.card_desc: [Stellar Wind] Increase air control by {scale=14|14}% while using Stellar Wind.

The Power Cosmeum.card_desc: [Void Grip] Enemies affected by Void Grip are crippled and take an additional 360 damage over its duration.

Abgehoben.card_desc: [Sternenwind] Erhöht deine Sprunghöhe während Sternenwind um {scale=12|12}%.

Astralzyklus.card_desc: [Astralzeichen] Erhöht die Dauer von Astralzeichen um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Eklipse.card_desc: [Griff der Leere] Während Griff der Leere wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Fixstern.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Himmelsk\u00f6rper.card_desc: [Astralzeichen] Von Astralzeichen betroffene Verbündete verursachen 15% mehr Waffenschaden.

Himmlischer Zug.card_desc: [Griff der Leere] Erhöht die Reichweite von Griff der Leere um {scale=10|10}%.

Innerer Frieden.card_desc: [Griff der Leere] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Griff der Leere um {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Kosmische Barriere.card_desc: [Sternenwind] Während Sternenwind wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Kraftkosmeum.card_desc: [Griff der Leere] Von Griff der Leere betroffene Gegner werden verkrüppelt und erleiden während der Dauer 360 Schaden zusätzlich.

Lichtjahre.card_desc: [Astralzeichen] Erhöht die Reichweite von Astralzeichen um {scale=10|10}%.

Relativit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Astralzeichen] Nach Verwendung von Astralzeichen wirst du 10s lang {scale=40|40} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

R\u00fcckl\u00e4ufig.card_desc: [Astralzeichen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Astralzeichen um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Sonnensegel.card_desc: [Sternenwind] Erzeugt während Sternenwind jede Sekunde {scale=2|2} Munition.

Sternensucher.card_desc: [Sternenwind] Erhöht deine Luftkontrolle während Sternenwind um {scale=14|14}%.

Sternschnuppe.card_desc: [Griff der Leere] Stirbt ein Gegner nach bis zu 4s, nachdem er von Griff der Leere getroffen wurde, werden alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=20|20}% reduziert.

Ann\u00e9es-lumi\u00e8re.card_desc: [Marque astrale] La portée de Marque astrale augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Barri\u00e8re cosmique.card_desc: [Vent stellaire] Pendant Vent stellaire, vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins.

Chercheur d'\u00e9toiles.card_desc: [Vent stellaire] Pendant Vent stellaire, votre contrôle aérien augmente de {scale=14|14}%.

Corps c\u00e9leste.card_desc: [Marque astrale] Marque astrale augmente de 15% les dégâts d'arme infligés par sa cible.

Cosmeum de puissance.card_desc: [Emprise du vide] Emprise du vide applique un handicap et inflige 360 dégâts supplémentaires au total.

\u00c9clipse.card_desc: [Emprise du vide] Vous regagnez {scale=50|50} PV par seconde pendant Emprise du vide.

\u00c9toile binaire.card_desc: [Arme] Votre arme inflige 360 dégâts toutes les 0,4s.

\u00c9toile filante.card_desc: [Emprise du vide] Si la cible d'Emprise du vide meurt dans les 4s qui suivent, les temps de recharge en cours sont réduits de {scale=20|20}%.

Inertie.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Mouvement r\u00e9trograde.card_desc: [Marque astrale] Marque astrale se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Paix int\u00e9rieure.card_desc: [Emprise du vide] Emprise du vide se recharge {scale=1.2|1.2}s plus vite.

P\u00e9nombre.card_desc: [Arme] Vous avez {scale=5|5}% de drain de vie.

Relativit\u00e9.card_desc: [Marque astrale] Pendant 10s après l'activation de Marque astrale, vous regagnez {scale=40|40} PV par seconde.

Saut interstellaire.card_desc: [Vent stellaire] Pendant Vent stellaire, la hauteur de vos sauts augmente de {scale=12|12}%.

Traction c\u00e9leste.card_desc: [Emprise du vide] La portée d'Emprise du vide augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Voile solaire.card_desc: [Vent stellaire] Vent stellaire génère {scale=2|2} munitions par seconde.

Voyage astral.card_desc: [Marque astrale] Marque astrale dure {scale=0.5|0.5}s de plus.

\u4e8c\u91cd\u661f\u8f89.card_desc: [武器] 普通攻击现每0.4秒造成360点伤害

\u592a\u9633\u5e06.card_desc: [星际之风] 星际之风持续期间每秒获得{scale=2|2}发弹药

\u5b87\u5b99\u5c4f\u969c.card_desc: [星际之风] 星际之风的持续期间内获得{scale=5|5}%的伤害减免

\u5bfb\u661f\u8005.card_desc: [星际之风] 星际之风持续期间,空中控制能力提高{scale=14|14}%

\u5fc3\u9759\u5982\u6c34.card_desc: [虚空之握] 虚空之握的冷却时间降低{scale=1.2|1.2}秒

\u6052\u661f\u89c2\u6d4b.card_desc: [武器] 武器攻击附带{scale=1|1}秒的追踪效果

\u65e5\u8680.card_desc: [虚空之握] 虚空之握影响的目标在3秒内受到的治疗效果会降低{scale=15|15}%

\u661f\u5149\u95ea\u8000.card_desc: [神圣标记] 带有神圣标记的友军武器伤害也提高15%

\u76f8\u5bf9\u8bba.card_desc: [神圣标记] 释放神圣标记后，自身每秒回复{scale=40|40}点生命值，持续10秒

\u884c\u661f\u9006\u884c.card_desc: [神圣标记] 神圣标记的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u8f68\u9053\u5468\u671f.card_desc: [神圣标记] 神圣标记的持续时间提高{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u9668\u661f.card_desc: [虚空之握] 如果目标在虚空之握持续期间或之后的4秒内死亡，所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=20|20}%

\u98de\u8dc3\u592a\u7a7a.card_desc: [星际之风] 星际之风持续期间内，跳跃高度额外提升{scale=12|12}%

Buscador de estrellas.card_desc: [Viento estelar] Aumenta el control de aire un {scale=14|14}% mientras usas Viento estelar.

Configuraci\u00f3n de Lorentz.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta tu cantidad de munición en {scale=2|2}.

Cosmeum de poder.card_desc: [Agarre del vacío] Los enemigos afectados por Agarre del vacío son inhabilitados y reciben 360 PS de daño adicional mientras dura.

Eclipse.card_desc: [Agarre del vacío] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS por segundo mientras usas Agarre del vacío.

Estrella Binaria.card_desc: [Arma] Ahora Quebrador de estrellas inflige 360 PS de daño cada 0,4s.

Estrella fugaz.card_desc: [Agarre del vacío] Si una víctima de Agarre del vacío muere dentro de 4s tras verse afectado por la habilidad, reduce todas las recargas activas un {scale=20|20}%

Giro interestelar.card_desc: [Viento estelar] Aumenta la altura de tu salto un {scale=12|12}% mientras usas Viento estelar.

Luminaria.card_desc: [Marca astral] Cualquier aliado afectado por Marca astral inflige un 15% más de daño de arma.

Muro c\u00f3smico.card_desc: [Viento estelar] Obtienes un {scale=5|5}% de reducción de daño mientras dura.

Relativismo.card_desc: [Marca astral] Te curas {scale=40|40} PS por segundo durante 10 s al aplicar Marca astral.

Retr\u00f3grada.card_desc: [Marca astral] Se reduce la recarga de Marca astral en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Serenidad.card_desc: [Agarre del vacío] Reduces la recarga de Agarre del vacío en {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Tiro celestial.card_desc: [Agarre del vacío] Aumenta el alcance de  Agarre del vacío un {scale=10|10}%.

Velo solar.card_desc: [Viento estelar] Obtienes {scale=2|2} de munición cada segundo durante Viento estelar.

Agilidade Espacial.card_desc: [Vento Estelar] Aumenta a altura do pulo em {scale=12|12}% durante o Vento Estelar

Anos-luz.card_desc: [Marca Astral] Aumenta o alcance da Marca Astral em {scale=10|10}%.

Barreira C\u00f3smica.card_desc: [Vento Estelar] Ganha {scale=5|5}% de redução de dano recebido enquanto estiver usando Vento Estelar.

Ca\u00e7ador de Estrelas.card_desc: [Vento Estelar] Aumenta o controle no ar em {scale=14|14}% durante o Vento Estelar

C\u00edrculo Astral.card_desc: [Marca Astral] Aumenta a duração da Marca Astral em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Configura\u00e7\u00e3o de Lorentz.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=2|2} a quantidade de munição.

Eclipse.card_desc: [Agarrão do Vazio] Cura {scale=50|50} de vida por segundo enquanto estiver usando o Agarrão do Vazio.

Estrela Bin\u00e1ria.card_desc: [Arma] Detonador das Estrelas agora causa 360 de dano a cada 0,4s.

Estrela Cadente.card_desc: [Agarrão do Vazio] Se o alvo do Agarrão do Vazio morrer em 4s após ser agarrado, os intervalos ativos são reduzidos em {scale=20|20}%.

In\u00e9rcia.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a velocidade de recarga da arma em {scale=5|5}%.

Luminoso.card_desc: [Marca Astral] Qualquer aliado afetado pela Marca Astral causa 15% a mais de dano com sua arma.

O Poder C\u00f3smico.card_desc: [Agarrão do Vazio] Inimigos afetados pelo Agarrão do Vazio são debilitados e recebem 360 de dano adicional pela sua duração.

Paz Interior.card_desc: [Agarrão do Vazio] Diminui o intervalo do Agarrão do Vazio em {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Pux\u00e3o Celestial.card_desc: [Agarrão do Vazio] Aumenta a distância no qual o Agarrão do Vazio pode ser usado em {scale=10|10}%

Relatividade.card_desc: [Marca Astral] Usar a Marca Astral cura você em {scale=40|40} por segundo durante 10 segundos.

Retr\u00f3grado.card_desc: [Marca Astral] Reduz o intervalo da Marca Astral em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Ventos Solares.card_desc: [Vento Estelar] Ganha {scale=2|2} de munição por segundo enquanto estiver usando Vento Estelar.

\u0410\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Астральная метка] Длительность Астральной метки увеличивается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0410\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043e\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Звездный ветер] Во время действия Звездного ветра управление в воздухе улучшается на {scale=14|14}%.

\u0412 \u043a\u043e\u0441\u043c\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Звездный ветер] Во время действия Звездного ветра высота прыжка увеличивается на {scale=12|12}%.

\u0412\u043d\u0443\u0442\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Хватка пустоты] Перезарядка Хватки пустоты сокращается на {scale=1.2|1.2} с.

\u0414\u0432\u043e\u0439\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Звездокол наносит 360 ед. урона каждые 0,4 с.

\u0417\u0430\u0442\u043c\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Хватка пустоты] Во время действия Хватки пустоты вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед. в секунду.

\u041a\u043e\u0441\u043c\u0438\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Звездный ветер] Во время использования Звездного ветра вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона.

\u041d\u0435\u0431\u0435\u0441\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Хватка пустоты] Дальность Хватки пустоты увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.
[Астральная метка] Под действием Астральной метки ваши союзники наносят на 15% больше урона из оружия.

\u041e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Астральная метка] Перезарядка Астральной метки сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041e\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Астральная метка] Использование Астральной метки исцеляет вас на {scale=40|40} ед. в секунду в течение 10 с.

\u041f\u0430\u0434\u0430\u044e\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Хватка пустоты] Смерть жертв Хватки пустоты в течение 4 с. после ее использования сокращает текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0421\u0432\u0435\u0442\u043e\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Астральная метка] Дальность Астральной метки увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u043a\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Хватка пустоты] Враги под действием Хватки пустоты парализуются и получают на 360 ед. больше урона в течение действия способности.

\u0421\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0435\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Звездный ветер] Во время действия Звездного ветра вы получаете {scale=2|2} ед. боеприпасов в секунду.

Cia\u0142o niebieskie.card_desc: [Gwiezdny znak] Każdy sojusznik, który znajdzie się pod wpływem Gwiezdnego znaku zadaje 15% więcej obrażeń bronią.

Cykl astralny.card_desc: [Gwiezdny znak] Zwiększa czas trwania Gwiezdnego znaku o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Kosmiczna bariera.card_desc: [Gwiezdny wiatr] Zapewnia {scale=5|5}% redukcji obrażeń podczas przebywania w Gwiezdnym wietrze.

Kosmiczny mecz.card_desc: [Gwiezdny wiatr] Zwiększa wysokość skoku o {scale=12|12}% podczas korzystania z Gwiezdnego wiatru.

Lata \u015bwietlne.card_desc: [Gwiezdny znak] Zwiększa zasięg Gwiezdnego znaku o {scale=10|10}%.

Moc kosmosu.card_desc: [Tchnienie pustki] Wrogowie objęci Tchnieniem pustki zostają okaleczeni i otrzymują dodatkowo 360 obrażeń podczas trwania umiejętności.

Niebia\u0144ski wp\u0142yw.card_desc: [Tchnienie pustki] Zwiększa zasięg Tchnienia pustki o {scale=10|10}%.

Podw\u00f3jna gwiazda.card_desc: [Broń] Rozbijacz gwiazd zadaje teraz 360 obrażeń co 0,4 s.

Poszukiwacz gwiazd.card_desc: [Gwiezdny wiatr] Zwiększa kontrolę lotu o {scale=14|14}% podczas korzystania z Gwiezdnego wiatru.

Retrogradacja.card_desc: [Gwiezdny znak] Skraca czas odnowienia Gwiezdnego znaku o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Spadaj\u0105ca gwiazda.card_desc: [Tchnienie pustki] Jeśli ofiara Tchnienia pustki umrze w ciągu 4 s od trafienia tą umiejętnością, aktywne czasy odnowienia zostają skrócone o {scale=20|20}%.

Wewn\u0119trzny spok\u00f3j.card_desc: [Tchnienie pustki] Skraca czas odnowienia Tchnienia pustki o {scale=1.2|1.2} s.

Wzgl\u0119dno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Gwiezdny znak] Nakładanie Gwiezdnego znaku przywraca ci {scale=40|40} PZ na sekundę przez 10 s.

Za\u0107mienie.card_desc: [Tchnienie pustki] Przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ na sekundę podczas używania Tchnienia pustki.

\u017bagle s\u0142oneczne.card_desc: [Gwiezdny wiatr] Zapewnia {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji za każdą sekundę spędzoną w Gwiezdnym wietrze.

Astral D\u00f6ng\u00fc.card_desc: [Astral İşaret] Astral İşaret'in süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn artır.

Ay Tutulmas\u0131.card_desc: [Hiçlik Kavrayışı] Hiçlik Kavrayışı'nı kullanırken her saniye {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

\u00c7ift Y\u0131ld\u0131z.card_desc: [Silah] Yıldız Delici artık her 0,4 saniyede 360 hasar veriyor.

G\u00fc\u00e7 Evreni.card_desc: [Hiçlik Kavrayışı] Hiçlik Kavrayışı'ndan etkilenen düşmanlar felç olurlar ve etkin olduğu süre boyunca 360 hasar alırlar.

\u0130\u00e7 Huzur.card_desc: [Hiçlik Kavrayışı] Hiçlik Kavrayışı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1.2|1.2} sn azalt.

I\u015f\u0131lt\u0131.card_desc: [Astral İşaret] Astral İşaret'in etkisi altında olan herhangi bir müttefikin %15 daha fazla silah hasarı verir.

\u0130zafiyet.card_desc: [Astral İşaret] Astral İşaret kullanımı ile 10 sn boyunca her saniye {scale=40|40} Can iyileşirsin.

Kozmik Bariyer.card_desc: [Yıldız Esintisi] Yıldız Esintisi kullanırken %{scale=5|5} Hasar Azaltma kazan.

Kutsal \u00c7ekim.card_desc: [Hiçlik Kavrayışı] Hiçlik Kavrayışı'nı kullanabileceğin menzili %{scale=10|10} artır.

Tersine.card_desc: [Astral İşaret] Astral İşaret'in Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azalt.

Uzay Smac\u0131.card_desc: [Yıldız Esintisi] Yıldız Esintisi kullanırken zıplama yüksekliğini %{scale=12|12} artır.

Uzay Yelkenlisi.card_desc: [Yıldız Esintisi] Yıldız Esintisi sırasında saniyede {scale=2|2} Cephane kazan.

Y\u0131ld\u0131z Kaymas\u0131.card_desc: [Hiçlik Kavrayışı] Eğer bir düşman Hiçlik Kavrayışı ile vurulduktan sonra 4 sn içinde ölürse tüm aktif Bekleme Süreleri %{scale=20|20} azalır.

Y\u0131ld\u0131z Pe\u015finde.card_desc: [Yıldız Esintisi] Yıldız Esintisi sırasında hava kontrolünü %{scale=14|14} artır.
